plot: Back home, Leila was involved in a mysterious car accident that her mind has blocked from her memory. Now it's Summer, and Leila escapes on a Roman Holiday to tend to her wounds in the arms...
title: Vu
plot_es: Back home, Leila was involved in a mysterious car accident that her mind has blocked from her memory. Now it's Summer, and Leila escapes on a Roman Holiday to tend to her wounds in the arms...
